#JAVA package org.inria.dmsp.schema;

#//////////////////////////////////////////////////
#// CODE AFTER THAT IS GENERATED BY QEPGenerator //
#//////////////////////////////////////////////////

#This is the set of SQL queries used to generate EP_UI.java
#Note that :
#  - EP generation fails (bug...) when altogether, must be generated by query type 
#  - EP generation for queries marked by x is buggy and must be corrected by hand

#NB: to be able to quickly build the java file, a header is placed at the 
#beginning of the file and should be removed from the output.
#--> Replace "//JAVA " by "" in the output.

#Bugs:
#buggy plans are tagged with "TODO" 
#--> those plans must be corrected manually

#JAVA public class EP_UI {

#JAVA 	  /*  TODO (FOR OPTIM):
#JAVA 		   *  o	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_BETWEEN_DATEEVENT		--> Optimization query for "Tableau de bord"
#JAVA 		   *  o	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_ INFOnoc_BY_FORM									--> Optimization query for "calendrier"
#JAVA 		   *  o	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_ INFO_pos_num_BY_FORM							--> Optimization query for "Plan d'aide"
#JAVA 		   *  o	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_nom_prenom_type_tel_idglobal_USER				--> Optimization query for "Liste des Intervenants"
#JAVA 		   *  o	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_civilite_nom_prenom_BY_IDGLOBAL			--> Optimization query for "Fiche de synthèse - référent user"
#JAVA 		   *  TODO (REQUIRED):
#JAVA 		   *  o EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_EVENT_AND_FILTRE							--> Optimization query for "Fiche de synthèse - référent entourage"
#JAVA 		   *  o EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_valnum_BY_EVENT_AND_POSITION				--> Optimization query for "Fiche de synthèse - GIR"
#JAVA 
#JAVA 		   */

#liste de l'entourage (Info.Filtre=? pour récupérer les infos nom, prénom, lien => pas de comment)
#NB: identique à EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_FILTRE avec en + le champs IdUser
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_USER_EVENT_INFO_BY_FILTRE = 
AC VERBOSE SELECT i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValNum, i.IdEvent, i.ValDate, i.IdComment, i.TSSPT, e.IdUser FROM Event e, Info i WHERE i.Idevent=e.IdGlobal AND i.Filtre=?;

#liste des fiches de liaison (Info.Filtre=? pour récupérer les infos Date, Type, Origine, Cat. Prof., Obs. => un comment)
#NB: identique à EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_FILTRE avec en + le champs IdUser, et l'accès au comment (=> valcomment à la place de IdComment)
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_USER_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FILTRE = 
AC VERBOSE SELECT i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValNum, i.IdEvent, i.ValDate, i.TSSPT, e.IdUser, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c WHERE i.Idevent=e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment=c.IdGlobal AND i.Filtre=?;	

#liste des fiches de liaison (Info.Filtre=? pour récupérer les infos Date, Type, Origine, Cat. Prof., Obs. => un comment)
#NB: identique à EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_USER_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FILTRE avec en + un critère d'intervalle sur la date de l'event
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_USER_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FILTRE_BETWEEN_DATEEVENT = 
AC VERBOSE SELECT i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValNum, i.IdEvent, i.ValDate, i.TSSPT, e.IdUser, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c WHERE i.Idevent=e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment=c.IdGlobal AND i.Filtre=? AND e.DateEvent>? AND e.DateEvent<?;
	
#Optimization query for the "tableau de bord" ==> OK
#We add the form table for optimization ...
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_BETWEEN_DATEEVENT = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, i.IdEvent, c.ValComment FROM event e, info i, comment c, Formulaire f WHERE i.IdEvent=e.IdGlobal and i.IdComment=c.IdGlobal and e.IdForm = f.IdGlobal and f.IdGlobal=? and e.DateEvent > ? and e.DateEvent < ?

#Optimization query for the "calendrier" ==> OK
#Should replace EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_AND_FILTRE
#Un des infoDM repéré par son concept indique dans quel cas on est :
#(1) case du calendrier (2) note de bas de page
#Dans tous les cas, pas besoin de comments  
#We add the form table for optimization ... 
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFOnoc_BY_FORM =  
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdEvent, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum FROM event e, info i, formulaire f WHERE i.IdEvent=e.IdGlobal and e.IdForm = f.IdGlobal and f.IdGlobal=?

#Optimization query for the "Plan d'aide"==> OK
#Special version of EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM projecting only position and valnum
#We add the form table for optimization ... 
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_pos_num_BY_FORM =  
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT I.Position, I.ValNum FROM info I, event E, formulaire F WHERE I.IdEvent = E.IdGlobal and E.IdForm = F.IdGlobal AND F.IdGlobal = ?

#Optimization query for the "Liste des Intervenants" ==> OK
#Version of EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER projecting only useful fields
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_nom_prenom_type_tel_idglobal_USER =  
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT Nom, Prenom, Type, Tel, IdGlobal FROM UserDMSP

#Optimization query for the "Fiche de synthèse - référent user" ==> OK
#Version of EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_ID  projecting only useful fields
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_civilite_nom_prenom_BY_IDGLOBAL =  
AC VERBOSE SELECT Civilite, Nom, Prenom FROM UserDMSP u WHERE u.IdGlobal = ?

#Optimization query for the "Fiche de synthèse - référent entourage"==> OK
#Special version of EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_EVENT projecting only useful fields
#The filter (Filtre) should indicate the useful fields for the query (civilite, nom, prenom)
#Valnum for civilité ????
#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_EVENT_AND_FILTRE =  
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValNum FROM Event e, Info i WHERE i.IdEvent=e.IdGlobal and e.IdGlobal=? and i.Filtre = ?

#Optimization query for the "Fiche de synthèse - GIR" ==> OK
#We add the event table for optimization ...
#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_valnum_BY_EVENT_AND_POSITION =  
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.ValNum FROM Event e, Info i WHERE i.IdEvent=e.IdGlobal and e.IdGlobal=? and i.Position = ?

# LOGIN:
# EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_CERTIF
# EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_HABILITATION_BY_IDUSER
#x EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_AUTHORIZED_INSERT_FORM  
#SELECT PLANS:
# EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_EVENT_FORM_USER_BY_FILTRE
# EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_FORM_USER_BY_FILTRE
#	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM 	
#	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_ID			
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_EVENT	
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_FILTRE		
#	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_INFOLEGALE
#	EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_AND_FILTRE 
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_AND_FILTRE_FROM_EVENT
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM_AND_DATE  	
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_EVENT_AND_CONCEPT 
# EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_BY_ID
# EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_HABILITATION
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM_AND_POSITION
# EP_QUERY_SELECT_USER_HABILITATION
#	EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_valnum_BY_EVENT_AND_POSITION
#INSERT PLANS:
#x OEP_EVENT_AC_INSERT
#x OEP_INFO_AC_INSERT
#x OEP_COMMENT_NOAC_INSERT
#x EP_HABILITATION_NOAC_INSERT
#	EP_DELETED_NOAC_INSERT

#UPDATE PLANS:
# INFO_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID
#x COMMENT_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID
# EVENT_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID
#DELETE PLANS:
# EP_HABILITATION_NOAC_DELETE_BY_USER
#

###########
#  LOGIN: #
###########

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_FORM=
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.IdEvent, i.IdConcept, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, i.IdComment FROM Event e, Info i WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm = ?

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_CERTIF = 
VERBOSE SELECT IdGlobal, IdRole, Nom, Prenom FROM UserDMSP WHERE Certificate = ?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_HABILITATION_BY_IDUSER = 
VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT IdRole FROM Habilitation WHERE IdUser = ?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_AUTHORIZED_INSERT_FORM = 
#JAVA //SELECT F.IdGlobal FROM Formulaire F, UserDMSP U, Episode E WHERE U.Idintern = ? AND E.IdIntern = ?; 
#JAVA //--> not supported  
#JAVA // TODO (DONE): do it by hand (see org.inria.dmsp.EP_UI)  
#JAVA // from org.inria.dmsp.EP_UI :
#JAVA "/*EP \u0002 " +
#JAVA "0 8 8 0 # " +  // SCAN, Table EPISODE(0) --> r0 (pos_ep)
#JAVA "4 7 7 8 0 0 ?1 r0 # " +   // SELECT, Att IdGlobal(0) BUT SHOULD BE ID_INTERN !!!, equal (0),// value ?1 (in r1), with value in r0 --> r1 (pos_ep=?1)
#JAVA "0 6 6 2 # " +    // SCAN, Table USER(2) --> r2 (pos_us)
#JAVA "4 5 5 6 10 0 ?2 r2 # " +   // SELECT, Att IdGlobal(10) BUT SHOULD BE ID_INTERN !!!, equal (0),// value ?2 (in r3), with value in r2 --> r3 (pos_us=?2)
#JAVA "0 3 3 1 # " +    // SCAN, Table FORM(1) --> r4 (pos_fo)
#JAVA "7 4 4 5 7 # " + // FLOW
#JAVA "7 2 2 3 4 # " + // FLOW
#JAVA "8 1 1 2 3 r2 r4 r0 # " +   // ACCESS_RIGHTS INSERT (3), USER (r2), FORM (r4), EPISODE (r0)
#JAVA "1 0 0 1 r4 1 1 1 5 # " +   // TABLE_LOOKUP, Pos r4, 1 col, Table FORM(1), a TABLE(1), IDG(5)// --> r5 (Form.IdGlobal)
#JAVA "\u0000 1 1 5 IdGlobal # \u0000*/";   // 1 col, Type Number(1), Pos r5, Name IdForm
#JAVA //"\u0000 4 1 4 IdForm 1 2 IdUser 1 0 IdEpisode 1 5 IdGlobal # \u0000*/";   // 1 col, Type Number(1), Pos r5, Name IdForm


##################
#  SELECT PLANS: #
##################

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_EVENT_FORM_USER_BY_FILTRE = 
VERBOSE SELECT u.Nom, e.DateEvent,e.IdGlobal eIdGlobal, f.IdGlobal fIdGlobal,u.IdGlobal uIdGlobal,   e.TSSPT FROM UserDMSP u, Event e, Formulaire f WHERE f.idGlobal = e.idForm AND u.idGlobal = e.idUser AND f.Filtre = ?

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_FORM_USER_BY_FILTRE = 
AC VERBOSE SELECT u.Nom, e.DateEvent,e.IdGlobal eIdGlobal, f.IdGlobal fIdGlobal,u.IdGlobal uIdGlobal,   e.TSSPT FROM UserDMSP u, Event e, Formulaire f WHERE f.idGlobal = e.idForm AND u.idGlobal = e.idUser AND f.Filtre = ?

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM = 
VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm=?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM  = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm=?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_EVENT = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, c.ValComment, e.DateFin FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.IdGlobal=?

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_ID = 
VERBOSE SELECT Nom, Type, Responsable, Identifiant, Civilite, Prenom, Adresse, CodePost, Ville, Tel, Mobile, Courriel, InfoLegale, IdRole FROM UserDMSP WHERE IdGlobal = ?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_INFO_BY_FILTRE =
AC VERBOSE SELECT Position, ValChar, ValNum, IdEvent, ValDate, IdComment, TSSPT FROM Info WHERE Filtre=?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER_BY_INFOLEGALE = 
VERBOSE SELECT IdGlobal, Nom, Type, Identifiant, Civilite, Prenom, Tel, Mobile, IdRole, Ville FROM UserDMSP WHERE infolegale=?;

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_USER = 
SELECT IdGlobal, Nom, Type, Identifiant, Civilite, Prenom, Tel, Mobile, IdRole, Ville FROM UserDMSP;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_AND_FILTRE = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT e.IdGlobal IdEvent, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c  WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm=? AND i.Filtre = ?;

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_FORM_AND_FILTRE_FROM_EVENT =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT e.IdGlobal, i.Position, i.ValChar, i.ValDate, i.ValNum, c.ValComment FROM Event e, Info i, Comment c  WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm=? AND e.Filtre = ?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM_AND_DATE =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT I.ValChar, I.ValNum, I.ValDate, I.Position, I.TSSPT, E.DateFin, E.IdGlobal IdEvent, E.IdUser FROM Info I, Event E WHERE I.IdEvent = E.IdGlobal AND E.IdForm=? AND E.DateFin>?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM_SINGLEEVENT =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT I.ValChar, I.ValNum, I.ValDate, I.Position FROM Info I, Event E WHERE I.IdEvent = E.IdGlobal AND E.IdForm=?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_COMMENT_BY_EVENT_AND_CONCEPT = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT i.Position, c.ValComment FROM Info i, Comment c, Event e WHERE e.IdGlobal = i.IdEvent AND i.IdComment = c.IdGlobal AND e.Idglobal=? AND i.IdConcept=?

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_BY_ID = 
AC VERBOSE SELECT DateFin FROM Event WHERE IdGlobal = ?;

#JAVA public static String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_HABILITATION =  
VERBOSE SELECT IdUser,IdGlobal FROM habilitation;

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM =
AC NO_CI SELECT I.ValChar, I.ValNum, I.ValDate, I.Position, E.IdGlobal IdEvent FROM Info I, Event E WHERE I.IdEvent = E.IdGlobal AND E.IdForm=?

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_FORM_AND_POSITION =
AC NO_CI SELECT i.ValChar FROM Event e, Info i WHERE i.IdEvent = e.IdGlobal AND e.IdForm=? AND i.Position = ?

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_SELECT_USER_HABILITATION =
VERBOSE SELECT u.Nom, u.Prenom, u.Type, u.Tel, u.IdGlobal, h.IdRole FROM UserDMSP u, Habilitation h WHERE u.IdGlobal = h.IdUser

#################
# INSERT PLANS: #
#################

#JAVA public static String OEP_EVENT_AC_INSERT = 
#TODO (DONE): replace IdGloal "?1" by numeroauto "v30", replace TSSanteos 0 with "v10", decrement numbering  of ?i  
AC VERBOSE INSERT INTO Event (Author, TSSPT, TSSanteos, IdForm, IdUser, IdEpisode, DateEvent, DateFin, Filtre) VALUES (?, ?, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

#JAVA public static String OEP_INFO_AC_INSERT = 
#TODO (DONE): replace IdGloal "?1" by numeroauto "v30", replace TSSanteos 0 with "v10", decrement numbering  of ?i  
AC VERBOSE INSERT INTO Info (Author, TSSPT, TSSanteos, IdEvent, IdComment, ValChar, ValNum, ValDate, Position, Filtre, IdConcept) VALUES (?, ?, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

#JAVA public static String OEP_COMMENT_NOAC_INSERT = 
#TODO (DONE): replace IdGloal "?1" by numeroauto "v30", replace TSSanteos 0 with "v10", decrement numbering  of ?i  
VERBOSE INSERT INTO Comment (Author, TSSPT, TSSanteos, ValComment) VALUES (?, ?, 0, ?);
	
#JAVA public static String EP_HABILITATION_NOAC_INSERT = 
#TODO (DONE): replace IdGloal "?1" by numeroauto "v30", decrement numbering  of ?i  
VERBOSE INSERT INTO habilitation (Author, TSSPT, TSSanteos, IdRole, IdUSer) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

#JAVA public static String EP_DELETED_NOAC_INSERT =
VERBOSE INSERT INTO TupleDeleted (IdGlobal, TabId, Author, TSSPT, TSSanteos) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

##################
#  UPDATE PLANS: #
##################

#JAVA public static String INFO_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI UPDATE Info SET TSSPT=?, ValChar=?, ValNum=?, ValDate=?, Filtre=? WHERE IdGlobal=?;

#JAVA public static String COMMENT_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID = 
#JAVA // AC UPDATE Comment SET TSSPT = ?, ValComment = ? WHERE IdGlobal = ?; 
#JAVA //  --> would be generated by moulinette without AC 
#JAVA //  TODO (DONE): do it by hand (see org.inria.dmsp.EP_UI)  
#JAVA // Taken from org.inria.dmsp.EP_UI:
#JAVA "/*EP \u0003 0 5 5 4 # " +	// scan of table info(4) --> r0 (infoPos)
#JAVA "1 4 4 5 r0 4 1 0 0 1 2 4 # " +   // TABLE LOOKUP pos r0, 4 cols, SKTinfo(1), is SKT(0), 0 (formPos->5), 1 (userPos->10), 2 (episodePos->0), 3 (idComment->47) --> r1-r4
#JAVA "8 3 3 4 1 r2 r1 r3 # " +         // access_type(0:read), in_res_UserDMSP(r2), in_res_Formulaire(r1), in_res_Episode(r3)
#JAVA "1 2 2 3 r4 3 5 1 47 48 50 # " +   // TABLE LOOKUP pos r0, 3 cols, table comment (5), is table(1), All attribute except those updated --> r5-r7
#JAVA "4 1 1 2 47 0 ?3 r5 # " +          // SELECT Col IdGlobal(47), is equal (0), to parameter 3, the value being in r1 --> r4
#JAVA "a 0 0 1 5 5 r4 47 r5 48 r6 49 ?1 50 r7 51 ?2 # \u0000*/";
#JAVA // TABLE UPDATE 5 cols, Table Comment(5), for tuple pos(R0), ColId, Ri
#JAVA // params: 1=49(TSSPT), 2=51(ValComment), 3=47(IdG)

#JAVA public static String EVENT_AC_UPDATE_BY_ID = 
AC VERBOSE NO_CI UPDATE Event SET TSSPT = ?, DateEvent = ?, DateFin = ?, Filtre = ? WHERE IdGlobal = ?;

##################
#  DELETE PLANS: #
##################

#JAVA public static String EP_HABILITATION_NOAC_DELETE_BY_USER = 
VERBOSE NO_CI DELETE FROM Habilitation WHERE IdUser=?;

#JAVA public static String EP_EVENT_AC_DELETE_BY_ID =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI DELETE FROM Event WHERE idGlobal = ?;

#JAVA public static final String EP_INFO_AC_DELETE_BY_EVENT =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI DELETE FROM Info WHERE IdEvent = ?

#JAVA public static String EP_INFO_AC_DELETE_BY_ID =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI DELETE FROM Info WHERE IdGlobal = ?;

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_SELECT_NOAC_INFO_BY_EVENT = 
VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT IdGlobal FROM Info WHERE IdEvent = ?

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_NOAC_SELECT_BY_ID =
VERBOSE SELECT Nom, Prenom FROM UserDMSP u WHERE u.idGlobal = ?

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_EVENT_AND_FILTRE =
VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT ValChar, Position FROM Info WHERE IdEvent = ? AND Filtre = ?

#JAVA public static final String EP_QUERY_AC_SELECT_EVENT_INFO_BY_EVENT_AND_POSITION =
AC VERBOSE NO_CI SELECT ValNum FROM Info WHERE IdEvent = ? AND Position = ?
	
#JAVA }
